symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present, especially with pressure

symptoms.name: Lesion
symptoms.pattern: Small, rough, grayish-brown or flesh-colored papules or plaques

physical_findings: Small, rough, grayish-brown or flesh-colored papules or plaques on the sole of the foot
May be single or multiple lesions
Lesions may be painful or tender to palpation

required: Clinical presentation consistent with plantar wart
supportive: History of exposure to infected individuals
